Uses of Package
com.tabuto.jsimlife.views

Packages that use com.tabuto.jsimlife.views
com.tabuto.jsimlife.actions   
com.tabuto.jsimlife.views   
 

Classes in com.tabuto.jsimlife.views used by com.tabuto.jsimlife.actions
JSLMainView
          Class that creates the main window in which appears all the Game components: JSLMenu: a menu bar;
JSLToolbar: a toolbar;
JSLSimulationView: the canvas panel where Zlifes lives;
JSLControlPanelView: the panel where some statistical information are displayed;
JSLStatusBar: the panel displayed some game informations;
This class uses the Configuration class in order to store some game parameters such as the canvas panel size, the background color of canvas panel, etc...
JSLNewCellView
          Class display the Frame contains all the parameters to create a new Zlife's type.
JSLPreferencesView
          Show a simple JFrame allows users change the game's configuration parameters
 

Classes in com.tabuto.jsimlife.views used by com.tabuto.jsimlife.views
JSLAboutView.BackgroundPanel
          Simple class extends JPanel to show a Image Background
JSLControlPanelView
          Simple class extends J2DControlPanel and display a simple JTable contains some statistical data.
JSLDnaTreePanelView
          Show a panel with a wrapped JTree able to display an XML documents such as a Dna
JSLMainView
          Class that creates the main window in which appears all the Game components: JSLMenu: a menu bar;
JSLToolbar: a toolbar;
JSLSimulationView: the canvas panel where Zlifes lives;
JSLControlPanelView: the panel where some statistical information are displayed;
JSLStatusBar: the panel displayed some game informations;
This class uses the Configuration class in order to store some game parameters such as the canvas panel size, the background color of canvas panel, etc...
JSLMenu
          This class extends JMenuBar to add into JSLMainView a simple men√π bar.
JSLSelectedZlifeView
          Show a JFrame contains several information about selected ZLife.
JSLSimulationView
          Class that extends J2DCanvasPanel in order to display the game sprites.
JSLStatusBar
          Simple Class extends J2DBottomPanel uses to display several game information: Actual Cell Number and Actual Game Status: PLAY or PAUSE.
JSLToolbar
          Simple Class extends JToolBar uses to show several JSimLife button that performs JSimLife's Actions
